title: 84A.41 DEFINITIONS.
text:
"Taxes," as used in sections 84A.31 to 84A.42 includes taxes of every kind and special assessments of every kind.
"Bonds" and "bonded indebtedness," as used in sections 84A.31 to 84A.42, include bonds and accumulated interest on bonds of every nature issued to finance or refinance the construction, maintenance, or repair of public drainage ditches.
